Code.Content:
$siteurl="" $listurl = "" $fldName = ""
$session = Get-SPTaxonomySession -Site $siteurl $defaultKeywordStore = $session.DefaultKeywordsTermStore $SystemGroup = $defaultKeywordStore.Groups["System"] $KeywordsTermSet = $SystemGroup.TermSets["Keywords"] $existedKeywords = $KeywordsTermSet.GetAllTerms() |Select Name
$list = Get-SPList $listurl $list.Items | % { $k = $_[$fldName]; write-output $k IF ($existedKeywords | ?{$_.Name -eq $k}) {"existed"} ELSE {$KeywordsTermSet.CreateTerm($k,1033)} write-output "_________" }
$defaultKeywordStore.CommitAll()

$siteurl="" $listurl = "" $fldName = ""
$session = Get-SPTaxonomySession -Site $siteurl $defaultKeywordStore = $session.DefaultKeywordsTermStore $SystemGroup = $defaultKeywordStore.Groups["System"] $KeywordsTermSet = $SystemGroup.TermSets["Keywords"] $existedKeywords = $KeywordsTermSet.GetAllTerms() |Select Name
$list = Get-SPList $listurl $list.Items | % { $k = $_[$fldName]; write-output $k IF ($existedKeywords | ?{$_.Name -eq $k}) {"existed"} ELSE {$KeywordsTermSet.CreateTerm($k,1033)} write-output "_________" }
$defaultKeywordStore.CommitAll()
